alert.note: Alert for Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 22 at 3:53PM CDT until further notice by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Texas... Oso Creek near Corpus Christi affecting Nueces County. For the Oso Creek...including Corpus Christi...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oso Creek near Corpus Christi. * WHEN...From late Wednesday morning until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, moderate lowland flooding occurs from the headwaters near Violet Road, or Farm to Market 24, to Oso Bay. Secondary roads and low bridges near the creek are also flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 11.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Wednesday morning, crest near 20.4 by Wednesday afternoon, then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (4 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Oso Creek Corpus Christ 20.0 11.6 Tue 3 pm 20.4 18.9 14.4 10.7 8.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
